titleStmt.title: A new disputation betweene the two lordly bishops, Yorke and Canterbvry. With a discourse of many passages which have happened to them, before and since that they were committed to the Tower of London. : Being very necessary for observation and well worth the reading.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected and enlarged. /

biblFull.extent: [1], 12 p., [1] leaf of plates : ill., port.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through with loss of print.
Reproductions of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library (reels 2645:26 and 2983:4).
